premise: Given that the work done by the gas on the outside world is W = 10 J.
conclusion: Determine the Work Done (W): W = 10 J.

conclusion: The process from A to B is an isobaric process (constant pressure) since AB is parallel to the V-axis, indicating constant temperature (isothermal).

conclusion: Apply the First Law of Thermodynamics: 0 = Q - 10 J.
